title: Artificial Intelligence and Behavior Emergence: Understanding Behavior Through Imitation Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Grasp of basic programming concepts and introductory-level artificial intelligence knowledge
context.additional_context: Collaborative learning environment utilizing digital devices (laptops/tablets), with education focused on language domain application cases

learning_goals: Learners can explain key elements of behavior generation by analyzing agent-environment interaction mechanisms.
Learners complete projects implementing simple behavioral patterns using a reservoir computing model based on imitative learning.
Learners can interpret experimental data (e.g., robot simulations) to evaluate the efficiency of learning architectures.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
